name: ROLLING BALL 2
description:
ROLLING BALL 2 - THE SECOND PART OF ROLLING BALL WHICH WAS LOVED BY THOUSANDS AND WITH TWIST

FEATURES - 

1- CUTTING EDGE GRAPHICS

2- SUPPORTS 90 FPS

3- 5 LEVELS (more to come in updates)

4- DIFFICULTY INCREASED IN LEVELS( as discussed with downloaders of rolling ball)

5 - NO LAG OR HEATING ISSUE(highly optimized )

6 - REGULAR UPDATES

7-NOW YOU CAN DRAG YOUR SCREEN TO SEE LEFT, RIGHT, UP OR DOWN WITH DYNAMIC CAMERA

8- ADDED BEAUTIFUL DYNAMIC SKY

9-PC VERSION IS ALSO PLANNED TO RELEASE THIS MONTH

TWIST-

WHEN YOU FACE ON DIFFERENT DIRECTION, THE CONTROLS GETS INVERTED AND THUS THE GAMEPLAY BECOMES MORE HARDER 

If you have any suggestions, fell free to contact me at 

pratham007talukdar@gmail.com

And also comment if you want ROLLING BALL 3
